attributes.action: More funding for Mental health services
attributes.background: Make sure that patients have access to the right care when inpatient in UK mental health wards  or in the community and not be dismissed. There needs to be  more training, more awareness and more care for young people in mental health services . More staff, more care, more treatments.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Improve awareness of mental health conditions and support for sufferers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616860

Fund increase number of NHS mental health inpatient beds: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620911
